dct_description_sm: California shown as a labeled island with a flat northern coast and same coastal place names. Nova Albion at top.
Great lakes are not shown. Partial outline of New Zealand depicted.
Title at bottom inside rock illustration.
"Cum Privilegio Ordinum Hollandiae et Westfrisiae." at bottom right.
Hemispheres surrounded by mythological depictions and allegorical figures representing the continents.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
